We follow this same interface including four-byte function selectors, in the precompile that wraps the pallet.","events":{"CancelUnbondingDelegation(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"CancelUnbondingDelegation defines an Event emitted when a given amount of tokens that are in the process of unbonding from the validator address are bonded again.","params":{"amount":"The amount of bond denomination that was in the unbonding process which is to be canceled This amount has the bond denomination precision stored in the bank metadata.","creationHeight":"The block height at which the unbonding of a delegation was initiated","delegatorAddress":"The address of the delegator","validatorAddress":"The address of the validator"}},"CreateValidator(address,uint256)":{"details":"CreateValidator defines an Event emitted when a create a new validator.","params":{"validatorAddress":"The address of the validator","value":"The amount of coin being self delegated"}},"Delegate(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Delegate defines an Event emitted when a given amount of tokens are delegated from the delegator address to the validator address.","params":{"amount":"The amount of bond denomination being delegated This amount has the bond denomination precision stored in the bank metadata.","delegatorAddress":"The address of the delegator","newShares":"The new delegation shares being held","validatorAddress":"The address of the validator"}},"EditValidator(address,int256,int256)":{"details":"EditValidator defines an Event emitted when edit a validator.","params":{"commissionRate":"The commission rate.","minSelfDelegation":"The min self delegation.","validatorAddress":"The address of the validator."}},"Redelegate(address,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Redelegate defines an Event emitted when a given amount of tokens are redelegated from the source validator address to the destination validator address.","params":{"amount":"The amount of bond denomination being redelegated This amount has the bond denomination precision stored in the bank metadata.","completionTime":"The time at which the redelegation is completed","delegatorAddress":"The address of the delegator","validatorDstAddress":"The address of the validator to which the delegation is directed","validatorSrcAddress":"The address of the validator from which the delegation is retracted"}},"Unbond(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Unbond defines an Event emitted when a given amount of tokens are unbonded from the validator address to the delegator address.","params":{"amount":"The amount of bond denomination being unbonded This amount has the bond denomination precision stored in the bank metadata.","completionTime":"The time at which the unbonding is completed","delegatorAddress":"The address of the delegator","validatorAddress":"The address of the validator"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"cancelUnbondingDelegation(address,string,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Allows delegators to cancel the unbondingDelegation entry and to delegate back to a the unbonding took place","delegatorAddress":"The address of the delegator","validatorAddress":"The address of the validator"},"returns":{"success":"Whether or not the unbonding delegation was cancelled"}},"createValidator((string,string,string,string,string),(uint256,uint256,uint256),uint256,address,string,uint256)":{"details":"Defines a method for creating a new consensus public key of the validator","validatorAddress":"The validator address","value":"The amount of the coin to be self delegated to the validator"},"returns":{"success":"Whether or not the create validator was successful"}},"delegate(address,string,uint256)":{"details":"Defines a method for performing a delegation of coins from a delegator to a validator.","params":{"amount":"The amount This amount should use the bond denomination precision stored in the bank metadata.","delegatorAddress":"The address of the delegator","validatorAddress":"The address of the validator"},"returns":{"success":"Whether or not the delegate was successful"}},"delegation(address,string)":{"details":"Queries the given amount of the bond denomination to a validator.","params":{"delegatorAddress":"The address of the delegator.","validatorAddress":"The address of the validator."},"returns":{"balance":"The amount in Coin, that the delegator has delegated to the given validator. This returned balance uses the bond denomination precision stored in the bank metadata.","shares":"The amount of shares, that the delegator has received."}},"editValidator((string,string,string,string,string),address,int256,int256)":{"details":"Defines a method for edit a validator.","params":{"commissionRate":"CommissionRate parameter to be updated. Use the string \"[do-not-modify]\" as the value of fields that should not be updated.","minSelfDelegation":"MinSelfDelegation parameter to be updated. metadata.","delegatorAddress":"The address of the delegator","validatorDstAddress":"The validator to which the redelegation is destined","validatorSrcAddress":"The validator from which the redelegation is initiated"},"returns":{"completionTime":"The time when the redelegation is completed"}},"redelegation(address,string,string)":{"details":"Queries all redelegations from a source to a This amount should use the bond denomination precision stored in the bank metadata.","delegatorAddress":"The address of the delegator","validatorAddress":"The address of the validator"},"returns":{"completionTime":"The time when the undelegation is completed"}},"validator(address)":{"details":"Queries validator info for a given validator address.","params":{"validatorAddress":"The address of the validator."},"returns":{"validator":"The validator info for the given validator address."}},"validators(string,(bytes,uint64,uint64,bool,bool))":{"details":"Queries all validators that match the given status.","params":{"pageRequest":"Defines an optional pagination for the request.","status":"Enables to query for validators matching a given status."}}},"title":"Staking Precompiled Contract","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"precompiles/staking/StakingI.sol":"StakingI"},"evmVersion":"shanghai","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"precompiles/common/Types.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd60ec66c59fd12854379aaddefde1b7b8014dd2a22b645a3385517f18c268447","license":"LGPL-3.0-only","urls":["bzz-raw://ca9fb179321231f8412277ce87659ede94207722361b6dd107e013b9ff5ea4ef","dweb:/ipfs/QmS7mK8U8rn6amEWhyzKNuu1H8J1Nktyp449851eauowEm"]},"precompiles/staking/StakingI.sol":{"keccak256":"0xaaa0eefd56c65eb8fd366144451043b2ad2942ea84a03dcc0433e7fba94d4da7","license":"LGPL-3.0-only","urls":["bzz-raw://29ace346915eb0d5de083c7ba27411fa48d63bac48f9457a7d6684298634f7c9","dweb:/ipfs/QmSrgjsEWwqA6Cw9vbhiBJ3PZMYgRyf1QfKw8qDdH414N2"]}},"version":1}

cancelUnbondingDelegation(address,string.details: Allows delegators to cancel the unbondingDelegation entry and to delegate back to a previous validator.

params.amount: The amount of the bond denomination This amount should use the bond denomination precision stored in the bank metadata.
params.creationHeight: The height at which the unbonding took place

returns.success: Whether or not the unbonding delegation was cancelled

createValidator((string,string,string,st.details: Defines a method for creating a new validator.

params.minSelfDelegation: The validator's self declared minimum self delegation
params.pubkey: The consensus public key of the validator
params.value: The amount of the coin to be self delegated to the validator

returns.success: Whether or not the create validator was successful

delegate(address,string,uint256).details: Defines a method for performing a delegation of coins from a delegator to a validator.

params.amount: The amount of the bond denomination to be delegated to the validator. This amount should use the bond denomination precision stored in the bank metadata.

returns.success: Whether or not the delegate was successful

delegation(address,string).details: Queries the given amount of the bond denomination to a validator.

returns.balance: The amount in Coin, that the delegator has delegated to the given validator. This returned balance uses the bond denomination precision stored in the bank metadata.
returns.shares: The amount of shares, that the delegator has received.

editValidator((string,string,string,stri.details: Defines a method for edit a validator.

params.commissionRate: CommissionRate parameter to be updated. Use commissionRate = -1 to keep the current value and not update it.
params.description: Description parameter to be updated. Use the string "[do-not-modify]" as the value of fields that should not be updated.
params.minSelfDelegation: MinSelfDelegation parameter to be updated. Use minSelfDelegation = -1 to keep the current value and not update it.

returns.success: Whether or not edit validator was successful.

redelegate(address,string,string,uint256.details: Defines a method for performing a redelegation of coins from a delegator and source validator to a destination validator.

params.amount: The amount of the bond denomination to be redelegated to the validator This amount should use the bond denomination precision stored in the bank metadata.
params.validatorDstAddress: The validator to which the redelegation is destined
params.validatorSrcAddress: The validator from which the redelegation is initiated

returns.completionTime: The time when the redelegation is completed

redelegation(address,string,string).details: Queries all redelegations from a source to a destination validator for a given delegator.

params.dstValidatorAddress: Defines the validator address to redelegate to.
params.srcValidatorAddress: Defines the validator address to redelegate from.

returns.redelegation: The active redelegations for the given delegator, source and destination validator combination.

redelegations(address,string,string,(byt.details: Queries all redelegations based on the specified criteria: for a given delegator and/or origin validator address and/or destination validator address in a specified pagination manner.

params.delegatorAddress: The address of the delegator as string (can be a zero address).
params.dstValidatorAddress: Defines the validator address to redelegate to (can be empty string).
params.pageRequest: Defines an optional pagination for the request.
params.srcValidatorAddress: Defines the validator address to redelegate from (can be empty string).

returns.response: Holds the redelegations for the given delegator, source and destination validator combination.

unbondingDelegation(address,string).details: Returns the delegation shares and coins, that are currently unbonding for a given delegator and validator pair.

returns.unbondingDelegation: The delegations that are currently unbonding.

undelegate(address,string,uint256).details: Defines a method for performing an undelegation from a delegate and a validator.

params.amount: The amount of the bond denomination to be undelegated from the validator. This amount should use the bond denomination precision stored in the bank metadata.

returns.completionTime: The time when the undelegation is completed

validator(address).details: Queries validator info for a given validator address.

returns.validator: The validator info for the given validator address.

validators(string,(bytes,uint64,uint64,b.details: Queries all validators that match the given status.

params.pageRequest: Defines an optional pagination for the request.
params.status: Enables to query for validators matching a given status.
